wikipedia.title: William Alexander Stewart
wikipedia.summary: William Alexander Stewart (September 12, 1930 – March 25, 2002) was a linguist specializing in creoles, known particularly for his work on African American Vernacular English.

wikipedia.title: Sociolinguistics
wikipedia.summary: Sociolinguistics is the descriptive study of the effect of any and all aspects of society, including cultural norms, expectations, and context, on the way language is used, and the effects of language use on society.

wikipedia.title: Standard language
wikipedia.summary: A standard language (also standard dialect or standardized dialect) is a language variety used by a group of people in their public discourse.

wikipedia.title: Pluricentric language
wikipedia.summary: A pluricentric language or polycentric language is a language with several interacting codified standard versions, often corresponding to different countries.
